name: Grizelda's Revenge
description:
You play as Grizelda, a cat who has been tragically abandoned by their owner for a quick coffee run. As revenge, Grizelda is on the war path to destroy the apartment.

Disrupt as many objects as possible within 60 seconds and discover the 3 possible endings that Grizelda can achieve.

*The game is best optimized for full screen mode*

Credits

Unity Assets: "2D Room" by kvazi, "Cat Sprite Sheet" pngegg.com

Music: "Your Wicked Ways" Richard J. Freitas, Geraldine Brioso

Code: Michael Baker, Brackeys, Melody Geiger
